about_the_game:
The hit comic "Berserk" joins the "Warriors" series!

The dark and profound world of "Berserk," a dark fantasy comic series that has sold over 40 million copies, is faithfully reproduced in this game. The latest graphics shows the fierce quest for vengeance of the main character Guts, and the deadly combat he encounters alongside his friends.


Experience the exhilaration of the “Warriors” series combined with an overwhelming destructive power!


Behold Berserk’s 1 vs. 1,000 slash and smash action!

The action of defeating hundreds of enemies, fundamental to the Warriors series, has been newly developed to match the world of "Berserk". In addition to the exhilaration of blowing away enemies, the main character, Guts, uses his giant man-sized sword "Dragon Slayer" to slay enemies using “Cleaving” and “Smashing” attacks for battles overflowing with power.


In the original work, Guts and his friends face numerous hopeless battle conditions surrounded by enemy soldiers and monsters. In this game, players can experience the "overwhelming destructive power" that overturns such situations with a single swing of the sword.




Experience the extensive and profound story of the original with the latest graphics.

The main mode of this title includes the "Golden Age Arc," which is particularly popular among fans of the comic, through “The Hawk of the Millennium Arc," in which the hero Guts continues his journey of revenge and gains many irreplaceable friends.


Key scenes and events between battles use powerful footage reproduced from 3D models and from the anime movies. In addition, interactions with the Band of the Hawk members, which were not portrayed in depth in the movie versions, can be enjoyed through in-game dialogue events.




Guts is not the only one who fights. A variety of playable characters!

Players can select not only the main character Guts, but his companions can be controlled as playable characters as the story progresses.


In addition to the Band of the Hawk members and reliable wizards, a variety of popular characters from the original story, including non-humans with extraordinary powers, are available. Guts' powerful “slash and smash action," can be enjoyed along with the other attractive characters in the "Berserk" series and their distinctive set of skills.
